stories.text: This post is more on the academic/challenge side of trying to get an English-French translation NLP model to run in assembly code. The main point of the referenced article is to load Python ML/NLP models in C/C++ applications but it also goes into getting assembly to work as an interesting challenge.
stories.title: Show HN: Machine learning inference in assembly code
Astronomers detect a radio “heartbeat” billions of light-years from Earth
New discoveries are rewriting the rulebook for regenerating limbs
Bill Gates vows to drop off world's rich list

stories.text:
I am looking to start monetizing a web-based app with ads. I would like some degree of control over where the apps are displayed and the type of ad content is allowed. Presently, the app is ONLY running as a website so the network needs to support this mode of serving ads.

What networks would be a good starting point to look at? Who are the reputable and established players in this space?

At first glance, Google AdSense does not seem to have the level of control I am looking for.
stories.title: Ask HN: Options for in-app advertising in a web app?
A deeper dive into the Rogers outage
NPM trends: parcel vs. snowpack vs. vite
Like Father Like Son: Elon Musk’s Dad Has Secret Second Kid with Stepdaughter
1,500 Tesla Powerwall owners have already joined the new virtual power plant
